Name: Agent-WaitHook.Profile
Summary: Auto-end wait if marker exists and not yet ended for current startedUtc

Name: Agent-Warmup
Summary: One-stop warm-up command to prep local agent context for #127 (watch telemetry + session lock).

Name: Analyze-JobLog
Summary: Read a GitHub Actions job log (zip or text) and optionally locate a pattern.

Name: Assert-NoAmbiguousRemoteRefs
Summary: Ensures the specified remote does not publish multiple refs (branch/tag)

Name: Auto-Release-WhenGreen
Summary: Polls GitHub Actions for a green Pester run on the RC branch and, when green, merges to main and tags vX.Y.Z.

Name: Capture-LabVIEWSnapshot
Summary: Capture a snapshot of active LabVIEW.exe processes for diagnostics.

Name: Check-DocsLinks
Summary: Quick link check across Markdown files.

Name: Check-PRMergeable
Summary: Check a pull request mergeability state via the GitHub API.

Name: Check-TrackedBuildArtifacts
Summary: Fails when tracked build artifacts are present in the repository.

Name: Close-LabVIEW
Summary: Gracefully closes a running LabVIEW instance using the provider-agnostic CLI abstraction.

Name: Debug-ChildProcesses
Summary: Capture a snapshot of child processes (pwsh, conhost, LabVIEW, LVCompare) with memory usage.

Name: Demo-FlakyRecovery
Summary: Demonstrate Watch-Pester flaky retry recovery using the Flaky Demo test.

Name: Diff-FixtureValidationJson
Summary: Computes a delta between two fixture validation JSON outputs.

Name: Dispatch-WithSample
Summary: Dispatch a workflow with a freshly-generated sample_id.

Name: Emit-LVClosureCrumb
Summary: Emit LV closure telemetry crumbs when enabled.

Name: Generate-ActionOutputsDoc
Summary: Generate markdown documentation for composite action inputs & outputs.

Name: Get-FileSha256
Summary: Compute the SHA-256 digest for a file.

Name: Get-PRVIDiffManifest
Summary: Generates a manifest of VI path pairs for pull-request comparisons.

Name: Guard-LabVIEWPersistence
Summary: Guard to observe LabVIEW/LVCompare process presence around phases.

Name: Invoke-JsonSchemaLite
Summary: When the supplied schema declares a const value that does not match the JSON payload's

Name: Invoke-LintDotSourcing
Summary: Helper wrapper for dot-sourcing lint task that tolerates missing script.

Name: Invoke-PRVIStaging
Summary: Stages VI pairs from a diff manifest using Stage-CompareInputs.

Name: Lint-InlineIfInFormat
Summary: Detect the PowerShell format operator specifically: "..." -f ...

Name: Lint-LoopDeterminism.Shim
Summary: Robust wrapper for Lint-LoopDeterminism.ps1 that tolerates mixed/positional args

Name: Lint-LoopDeterminism
Summary: Lint for CI loop determinism patterns in workflow/script content.

Name: Local-RunTests
Summary: Ensure local-friendly environment (no session locks or GH-only toggles)

Name: Local-Runbook
Summary: Default phases for local sanity runs

Name: New-SampleId
Summary: Generate a sample_id for workflow_dispatch runs.

Name: OneButton-CI
Summary: One-button end-to-end CI trigger and artifact post-processing for #127.

Name: Post-Run-Cleanup
Summary: Post-run cleanup orchestrator. Aggregates cleanup requests and ensures close

Name: PrePush-Checks
Summary: Local pre-push checks: run actionlint against workflows.

Name: Quick-DispatcherSmoke
Summary: Quick local smoke test for Invoke-PesterTests.ps1.

Name: Quick-VerifyCompare
Summary: Quick local verification of Compare VI action outputs (seconds + nanoseconds) without running full Pester.

Name: Run-Pester
Summary: Ensure the required Pester version is available locally

Name: Run-StagedLVCompare
Summary: Runs LVCompare against staged VI pairs recorded by Invoke-PRVIStaging.

Name: Send-CtrlC
Summary: Attempt to send Ctrl+C (and Ctrl+Break) to target console processes to unblock hangs.

Name: Set-IntegrationEnv.Sample
Summary: Sample script to set environment variables required for CompareVI integration tests.

Name: Stage-CompareInputs
Summary: Copy VI inputs into a temporary staging directory for safe LVCompare usage.

Name: Summarize-PRVIHistory
Summary: Builds a Markdown summary from pr-vi-history-summary@v1 payloads.

Name: Summarize-PesterCategories
Summary: Aggregate per-category Pester session-index totals and append a compact block to job summary.

Name: Summarize-VIStaging
Summary: Produces human-friendly summaries for staged LVCompare results.

Name: Tail-Snapshots
Summary: Follow a metrics snapshots NDJSON file produced by -MetricsSnapshotPath and pretty-print selected fields.

Name: Test-FixtureValidationDeltaSchema
Summary: Lightweight validation (no external JSON Schema engine): assert required keys & types

Name: Test-ForkSimulation
Summary: Creates a fork-style pull request, runs the compare workflows, and optionally

Name: Test-PRVIHistorySmoke
Summary: End-to-end smoke test for the PR VI history workflow.

Name: Test-PRVIStagingSmoke
Summary: End-to-end smoke test for the PR VI staging workflow.

Name: Traceability-Matrix
Summary: Traceability Matrix Builder (Traceability Matrix Plan v1.0.0)

Name: Update-FixtureManifest
Summary: Updates fixtures.manifest.json with current SHA256 & size metadata and optional pair digest block.

Name: Update-SessionIndexBranchProtection
Summary: Inject branch-protection verification metadata into a session-index.json file.

Name: Validate-Fixtures
Summary: Manual argument parsing (avoid param binding edge cases under certain hosts)

Name: Warmup-LabVIEW
Summary: Compatibility wrapper for Warmup-LabVIEWRuntime.ps1 (deprecated entry point).

Name: Watch-OrchestratedRest
Summary: Wrapper for the REST watcher that writes watcher-rest.json and merges it into session-index.json.

Name: Write-ArtifactList
Summary: Append a compact artifact path list to the job summary.

Summary: Append a detailed artifact map (exists, size, modified) to job summary.

Name: Write-CompareSummaryBlock
Summary: Append a concise Compare VI block from compare-summary.json.

Name: Write-DeterminismSummary
Summary: Append a concise Determinism block to the job summary based on LOOP_* envs.

Name: Write-FixtureDriftSummary
Summary: Append a concise Fixture Drift block from drift-summary.json (best-effort).

Name: Write-InteractivityProbe
Summary: Emit a small interactivity/console probe to the job Step Summary and stdout.

Name: Write-PesterTopFailures
Summary: Append a concise “Top Failures” section to the job summary from Pester outputs.

Name: Write-RerunHint
Summary: Append a concise re-run hint block using gh workflow run with sample_id.

Name: Write-RerunSummary
Summary: Append a step summary block that captures a rerun command and workflow link.

Name: Write-RunProvenance
Summary: Write run provenance (with fallbacks) to results/provenance.json and optionally append to the job summary.

Name: Write-RunnerIdentity
Summary: Append runner identity metadata to job summary.

Name: Write-SessionIndexSummary
Summary: Append a concise Session block from tests/results/session-index.json.

Name: actions
Summary: Minimal JS/TS action without external deps.
